/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/loadgen.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/loadgen.dir/CPU/CPULoadGenerator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/loadgen.dir/GPU/GPULoadGenerator.cu.o -o loadgen   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib /usr/local/cuda-12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
